price: 107. Ama koros Yallih digaalak ken buulta tiyay duddu ken hayta keenil obtaah keenit amaatee kee hinnay Qhiyaama garciik keenit tamaateemik amaan maay geen? usun tet cube kalah.
arabic: أَفَأَمِنُوٓاْ أَن تَأۡتِيَهُمۡ غَٰشِيَةٞ مِّنۡ عَذَابِ ٱللَّهِ أَوۡ تَأۡتِيَهُمُ ٱلسَّاعَةُ بَغۡتَةٗ وَهُمۡ لَا يَشۡعُرُونَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: afa-aminū an tatiyahum ghāshiyatun min ʿadhābi al-lahi aw tatiyahumu al-sāʿatu baghtatan wahum lā yashʿurūna
